Package com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame.actors

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame.actors.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Astronaut, Bullet
    public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the base class for anything that needs to move/act on the screen. You should write classes that extend the actor class to make your game work. The player class, enemy classes, bullet classes, and obstacle classes should all extend the Actor class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Actor

        public Actor​(java.lang.String fileName,
             double x,
             double y,
             double speed,
             Actor.Type type)
        Constructor that will set the image to the fileName and the position to the provided coordinates, and set the speed and type of the actor.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the relative location of the file ("images/filename.png")
        x - the x coordinate of the sprite
        y - the y coordinate of the sprite
        speed - the speed of the sprite, in scaled pixels
        type - the type of actor

    • Method Detail

      • loadImage

        private void loadImage()
        Using the fileName attribute, load the image into the sprite attribute

      • act

        public void act​(double deltaTime)
        Update the position based on the change in x and y attributes
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - the number of seconds since the last tick

      • draw

        public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                 java.awt.image.ImageObserver imageObserver)
        Draws the sprite centered at the x, y location. Adapts to scale of the JFrame.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics2D object to draw the image
        imageObserver - the JPanel where the sprite will be drawn
